linkedIn

Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • linkedIn.Company

  • public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is made to represent a company. The fields are basic enough to give a general idea of the company. As of now the only use for this class is to tell which company is bigger.
    Since:
    Feb 16, 2014
    Author:
    Matt Bell

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Company(java.lang.String name, int year, int employee, char type)
      Constructor:a new company; The company has no id number, it has no parent company, and it owns no companies.

        public Company(java.lang.String name,
       int year,
       int employee,
       char type)
        Constructor:a new company; The company has no id number, it has no parent company, and it owns no companies. Precondition: All parameters are valid as described
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the company
        year - the year of foundation
        employee - number of the employees
        type - the type of company

        c2 - the proposed smaller company
